VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: Ranger
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Rangers are masters of the bow, capable of raining down arrows from a distance to support allies in combat. They are a formidable foe that can turn the tide of any battle.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Rangers are masters of the bow, capable of raining down arrows from a distance to support allies in combat. They are a formidable foe that can turn the tide of any battle.
